{{Explore My Passion Projects}}

en.title: {{Mastering AI Course Portfolio}}
en.text: Comprehensive portfolio from the 6-week Codecademy AI bootcamp. Features multiple production-ready AI applications including SQL-Ball (football analytics), AI Code Generator, and AI Comparison Showcase. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, LangChain, and integrated with GPT-4, Claude 3.5, and vector databases.
